mapper.insert:
REPLACE INTO irs_approval_info (APPROVAL_ITEMID, approval_number, approval_title, current_state, deal_time, dept_code, dept_name, division_code, file_path, item_code, item_name, project_code, validity_date, validity_flag) VALUE
(#{item.approvalItemid},#{item.approvalNumber},#{item.approvalTitle},#{item.currentState},#{item.dealTime}, #{item.deptCode},#{item.deptName},#{item.divisionCode},#{item.filePath},#{item.itemCode},#{item.itemName}, #{item.projectCode},#{item.validityDate},#{item.validityFlag})
